alert.note: Alert for Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 12:54AM AKST until March 10 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with periods of low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel could be very difficult. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue into Friday morning. Winds will increase on Thursday causing blowing and drifting snow with periods of low visibility on Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
